description: Try our easy to follow Roasted Vegetable Tart recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury pie & tart,Eggplant,Roast,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Easter leftovers,High protein,High fibre,Leftover vegetable,Peanut free
name: Roasted Vegetable Tart Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 sheet frozen ready-rolled puff pastry, partially thawed
1 large red capsicum, cut into 2cm pieces
1 sheet frozen ready-rolled shortcrust pastry, partially thawed

recipeInstructions.text: Place the pumpkin, capsicum and eggplant in a large roasting pan. Add olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Toss vegetables until coated. Roast for 15-20 minutes, tossing occasionally, until golden and tender. Remove from the oven and add olives. Set aside to cool for 10 minutes.
Reduce oven to 200°C. Line two baking trays with baking paper.

Cut shortcrust pastry in half and place one sheet onto each tray. Pile vegetables on top. Crumble over the feta and season with freshly ground black pepper. Place a puff pastry sheet over each tart. Press edges together with a fork to seal. Trim excess pastry.
Brush the top of each tart with water. Score the top with a knife at 2cm intervals. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden.
